alec.is.awesome.spaceinvaders

Class GameLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • alec.is.awesome.spaceinvaders.GameLoop

  • public class GameLoop
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that creates a thread that executes rapidly to deal with game play.
